description: The London mayor tells i that May's election is "too close to call", citing new voter ID laws and voting system. "I’m under no illusion, I could lose."

title: Labour ‘to extend equal pay rights to ethnic minorities’ in draft Race Equality Act
description: Labour first committed to introducing a new Race Equality Act back in October 2020, after a review by Baroness Doreen Lawrence into the disproportionate impact of Covid on ethnic minorities found the virus had “thrived on” a situation created by decades of structural discrimination by the British state and society.

title: Rishi Sunak faces fresh calls from MPs for vote on Houthi strikes
description: Rishi Sunak is facing fresh calls to give MPs a vote on future strikes against the Houthis in Yemen after the UK joined a third wave of bombings over the weekend. The most senior MP in both the Liberal Democrats and the Green Party issued statements on Sunday saying now was the time for the House of Commons to have a vote.

title: Rishi Sunak begins Northern Ireland visit marking power-sharing's return
description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has arrived in Northern Ireland for a visit to mark the return of power-sharing government. He is due to attend Stormont on Monday to meet ministers, including First Minister Michelle O'Neill and Deputy First Minister Emma Little-Pengelly. Mr Sunak will also make a number of community engagements.
